name: Root Mania
description: There was a young boy who loved to eat fruits and vegetables of all kinds, But it was a no brainer for him when it came to apples. It was his favorite. His desire for apples was so great that it offended the apple trees. And so the trees decided to trap him in a maze wishing to starve him to death. Grab all the apples in the maze and with the newly found strength cut down the roots of the evil apple trees. One must be quick before the boy runs out of energy.
